result.execSummary:
The defendant Garett Levi Thomas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Polk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation no later than 4:00 pm on 1/11/16.
Must follow recommendations of Probation.
Concurrent with: 15CF03 - Count 1

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to COCC while on Probation.  If Defendant fails to pay while on Probation, remaining balance may be reduced to civil judgment.

No alcohol.  No drugs.  
Not to have contact with:  Byron Bird or family, Scott or Mary Kaufman, family or residence.

Must undergo COMPAS evaluation and follow through with criminogenic needs as recommended by Probation.
Must stay employed.
Letter of apology is allowed to Byron Bird through Probation and at their direction.
Must complete an AODA assessment and comply with recommendations.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 15CF3, 15CF146 & 15CM3. Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 2:51 pm
Exh 1, 2 & 3-O&R.  3:13 pm recess.  3:40 back on record.  3:53 Atty Firkus addresses ct. Exhibits 4, 5 & 6 O&R.  DE addresses ct.  4:09 recess.  4:20 back on record.  

SENTENCING:   DE can not posses firearm.  

15CF3-Count 1- impose prison sentence of 5 years 2 year confinement 3 years extended supervision imposed and stayed.  DE could get treatment, probation, alcohol free.  Probation 3 years, 6 months conditional time - no banked.  Time to start within 30 days of todays date.  Time can be served in Polk County or Barron County (as long as no fee to Polk).  Work release, subj to good time, homecare privledge.  Ct - does not order electronic monitoring at this time. Court costs of $290.60, DNA sample.  $250 DNA surcharge.  Rest. $500 to Mr Bird and $50 surcharge.  Ct will not order rest. on behalf of ins. co. at this time. 

15CF146-Count 2 & 3 - CT withholds sentence.  Ct - 2 year probation and will run with probation in other case.  Costs $265.60 payable during probation.  FTP may be reduced to civil judgment.  Ct - follow probation, compass, no drugs, no alcohol, AODA assessment and stay employed.  No contact with Mr Bird or family.  No contact with Larry Kaufman and Kaufman family or residence.  Ct - good case for restorative justice.  Ct will allow letter of apology to Mr Bird thru probation and their direction.  No banked time in this case.  DE to report to probation no later than 4:00 on 1-11-16.  

Ct goes over post conviction rights.  5:00 adj.
CASES: 15CF3, 15CM3 & 15CF146.  Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 4:06 PM.  Bonds cont.  4:07 pm adj.

CASES: 15CF3, 15CF146 & 15CM3. Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 8:55 am.  
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
15CF3-Count 1-NC plea.  CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.
Amended Information filed with the court - 15CF146-Count 2-NC plea.  Count 3-NC plea. CT accepts pleas, adj guilty & judgment entered.  Count 1 DRI for restitution/sentencing.  15CM3 DRI for restitution/sentencing.

15CF3-Order PSI, long form, COMPAS, PSI writer to consider 15CF146 in recommendation.  Agent not be present.  PSI due: 10/26/15.  Bonds cont.  9:18 am adj.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Information filed.  Firkus-NG plea, WST.  Bond cont.  2:10 pm adj.

Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 2:07 pm.  CT grants waiver of PH.  CT finds PC, def bound over.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:44 pm.  Steffen-ask to adjourn hearing.  CT grants request to adj the PH.  Bond cont.  1:55 pm adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Not to have contact with: Scott/Mary Kaufman, Not to be at cabin located at 232 85th Ave, Polk County WI.

Defendant Garett Levi Thomas in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 3:42 pm.  CT sets bond.  WSPH.  3:46 pm adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
